section.p: The ship keels over; timbers warp and split; mere anarchy is loosed upon you. Seawater rushes into the broken shell of the hull drowning out the cries of your crewmen. Cross them and the ship off your Ship’s Manifest. You can think of nothing now but saving yourself.

.
If the score is greater than your Rank, you are drowned - .
If the score is less than or equal to your Rank, you are swept miraculously towards a shore of white coral sand. Lose 2-12 Stamina points and (if you can survive that) .
